div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 110px; max-width: 185px; width: 184.889px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.p: Simple voltage-division using optoresistor. Input to Arduino Analog in. R2 works as a pull-up-resistor.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 140px; max-width: 185px; width: 184.889px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.p: No modifications to the original Zapper trigger circuit. R1 works as a pull-up-resistor. Can be ignored if the Arduino Digital IO pin has been configured to use as pull-up-mode.
